patterns: I am having trouble with my audio
I am having trouble with my video
Can't hear the speaker in zoom
responses: Double check that your speakers, microphone and webcam are turned on and functioning properly. Ensure they are connected to the correct device settings in zoom
leave the meeting and rejoin

patterns: How do I log in to the Moodle
What is Moodle
responses: Click on this link: https://moodle.kabarak.ac.ke/login
Moodle is a student online learning platform. It is found here: https://moodle.kabarak.ac.ke/login

patterns: What happens if I encounter technical issues during the exam?
I'm having technical issues with the exam
responses: Please contact your course instructor or technical support for assistance with technical issues during the exam.

patterns: How do I request additional time or accommodations?
I need more time for my exam
responses: You can request additional time or accommodations by contacting your course instructor or academic advisor.

patterns: What are the consequences of academic dishonesty in LockDown Browser?
I'm worried about academic dishonesty
responses: Academic dishonesty can result in serious penalties, including failing the course and being reported to the academic department. It is important to understand these consequences and to follow the academic integrity policies of your institution.

patterns: How do I navigate between exam questions in LockDown Browser?
I can't find my place in the exam
responses: You can navigate between exam questions by using the navigation buttons provided in the exam interface.

patterns: Where can I find more information about Respondus and its policies?
I want to know more about Respondus
responses: You can find more information about Respondus and its policies on their official website or by contacting their customer support.

patterns: How do I ensure my webcam and microphone are working properly?
My webcam and microphone are not working
responses: Ensure that your webcam and microphone are properly installed and functioning on your computer. You may need to test them in a different application to confirm they are working correctly.

patterns: Can I pause or resume the exam if I need a break?
I need to take a break during the exam
responses: Yes, you can pause or resume the exam at any time. You can do this by clicking on the appropriate button in the exam interface.

patterns: What happens if I forget my exam password?
I can't remember my exam password
responses: If you forget your exam password, you will need to contact your course instructor or academic advisor for assistance. They may be able to reset your password or provide you with a temporary one.

patterns: Can I use a browser extension or plugin with LockDown Browser?
I want to use a browser extension with LockDown Browser
responses: Yes, you can use browser extensions or plugins with LockDown Browser, but it's important to ensure they are compatible with the software and do not interfere with its functionality.

patterns: Can I take screenshots or copy text from the exam within LockDown Browser?
I want to take a screenshot of the exam
responses: Yes, you can take screenshots or copy text from the exam within LockDown Browser. This is typically done using the screenshot feature of your operating system or the browser itself.

patterns: How do I install and launch Respondus Lockdown Browser?
I need to install LockDown Browser
responses: To install and launch Respondus Lockdown Browser, you will need to follow the instructions provided by your institution or the software manufacturer. This typically involves downloading the software from a trusted source and running the installation file.

patterns: What features are disabled during a locked exam?
What can I do during a locked exam?
responses: During a locked exam, certain features may be disabled to ensure the integrity of the exam. This could include the ability to take screenshots, use a browser extension, or access external resources. You should refer to the exam instructions or your course instructor for more information.

patterns: Is there a specific browser I can access the moodle
responses: Any broswer can access the moodle. Visit the kabarak website

patterns: How do I obtain an enrollment key for a course on moodle
how do i get the enrollment key for a course
where can I get an enrollment key
responses: Enrollment key are given by a lecturer directly or via class representatives
The lecturer will give you the enrollment key after they register the unit in the Kabuo

patterns: How do i enroll a course in the moodle
How do I enroll a unit
I cannt enroll a unit
responses: Login to the Kabarak moodle, go to Site home-->Course categories-->Then enter the course code in capital letters
